page.title: 12Farms near Chobham, Woking
page.content: Off Chobham Road, the main road in Chobham, are several secondary roads that lead to farms and nurseries, one of which, Mimbridge, incorporates a garden centre. Nearby is a{pig}farm, specialising in Landrace and Durox breeds, also some pasture land for horses. Also on the north side of the road is a{mushroom}farm covering sixteen acres. Further down the road is a stream, The Bourne. The stream is clear of vegetation and the water flows north and it has only spread a few metres across. Common Close, leading off Chobham Road, contains a lot of detatched houses, a marked contrast to the farmland surrounding them.
